title: document ingestion endpoint accepts supported file formats
description: Test the POST /ingest endpoint to verify it accepts PDF, DOCX, TXT, and Markdown files, processes them correctly by chunking, embedding, and storing in the vector database, and returns accurate chunk counts.

title: rag query endpoint returns ai generated answers with sources
description: Test the POST /query endpoint to ensure it accepts natural language queries, performs vector similarity retrieval, generates AI responses referencing source documents, and supports both Spanish and English languages.

title: health check endpoint returns operational status
description: Test the GET /health endpoint to verify it returns HTTP 200 OK status along with service metadata confirming the system's operational status.

title: authentication endpoints enforce secure access and support bypass
description: Test the /auth/* endpoints to ensure OAuth2/JWT authentication is enforced in production environments and that the AUTH_BYPASS=true setting allows unrestricted access during local development.

title: drag and drop upload interface shows progress and feedback
description: Test the frontend drag-and-drop document upload interface to verify it normalizes file names including accented characters, shows upload progress, and provides accurate success or failure feedback.

title: ui settings persist and apply dynamically without reload
description: Test the UI settings endpoints and frontend components to ensure theme toggling, language selection, typography, and density settings persist across sessions using localStorage and apply dynamically without requiring page reload.

title: batch processing endpoints exist and respond appropriately
description: Test the /batch/* endpoints to verify their existence and that they respond appropriately, acknowledging that batch ingestion features are planned but backend implementation is pending.
